decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): P-12WR-01: OS MAP & BLOCK PLANS; P-12WR-02: EXISTING GROUND FLOOR PLAN; P-12WR-03: EXISTING FIRST FLOOR PLAN; P-12WR-06: PROPOSED FIRST FLOOR PLAN; P-12WR-07: PROPOSED ELEVATIONS; P-12WR-05: PROPOSED GROUND FLOOR PLAN
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
description: Application for a Non Material Amendment (S.96a) variation to remove  windows in the dormer and use cladding pursuant to condition 2 approved plans of planning permission 230368FUL dated 05.04.2023 for 'First floor extension facilitated by a rear roof extension and a front roof extension; Creation of a new service access and fire escape to the western side'
